description._content: Title: Fleche d'Or, Golden Arrow, Paris Creator: Wide World Photos Date: ca. 1926 Place: Paris, France Part Of: David Goodyear collection of foreign railroad photographs Description: This photograph depicts the up ''Fleche d'Or, '' Golden Arrow, coming into the Paris Nord station not long after the service started. The train was number 78 for many years. The engine of the first series (a Breville Pacific) has not yet received smoke deflectors and still is running with an ''armistice'' tender. Source: Collyns, Adrian H. Northern Steam Vapeurs du Nord. DeGolyer Library, Southern Methodist University, 2003. Physical Description: 1 photograph: black and white; 15 x 23 cm. File: ag1983_0266_24_01_11r_fleche_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/rwy,710 View Railroads: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/rwy
